pages.text: Use on any crop to put manure on it. $(br2)This will increase yield by 100%. $(br2)To put a second layer of manure, you need to first apply sulfur dust. $(br2)If you have applied 2 Manure and 1 Sulfur Dust on a crop, yield is increased by 300%. $(br)
Use on any crop to put sulfur on it. $(br2)This will increase yield by 200%.
Manure drops from Cows and Pigs.
Can be found anywhere underground in the deepslate layers.
